reasoningText.text:
The user wants me to migrate a Java project from Java 8 to Java 17. I need to:
1. First explore the project structure to understand what we're working with
2. Look at the pom.xml file(s) to see the current Java version and dependencies
3. Update the Java version to 17
4. Update all dependencies to versions compatible with Java 17
5. Run `mvn clean verify` to check if it works
6. Fix any issues that arise
7. Continue until `mvn clean verify` succeeds

    <profiles>

                        <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
